function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Development and application of 6G technology without considering health implications","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to electromagnetic frequencies and potential impact on public health","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough health impact assessments and implementing regulations on safe exposure limits","Technologies":"Health impact assessments, regulations on safe exposure limits","People":"Public, individuals living in urban areas","Owner":"Government, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of sustainability in the design and manufacturing of IoT devices","Impact":"Increased environmental impact and lack of alignment with climate-resilient policies","Mitigation":"Integrating sustainability criteria into the design and manufacturing process, aligning with climate-resilient policies","Technologies":"Sustainability assessments, climate-resilient design practices","People":"Manufacturers, urban planners","Owner":"Industry regulators, policymakers"}]}
